content: The most devious attack of all doesn't even start with his tongue. If you've studied his regular attacks, his hand slaps almost always start with his right hand (to your left) when not performing a large leap. However, if you see him quickly raise his left hand while hopping close (to your right) dodge immediately, or you'll be grabbed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
The most devious attack of all doesn't even start with his tongue. If you've studied his regular attacks, his hand slaps almost always start with his right hand (to your left) when not performing a large leap. However, if you see him quickly raise his left hand while hopping close (to your right) dodge immediately, or you'll be grabbed.
